scripts.dev:tmux: PORT=$(node -e "const net=require('net');let p=3000;(async()=>{while(p<3100){const sess=require('child_process').spawnSync('tmux',['has-session','-t','blog'],{stdio:'ignore'});if(sess.status===0){p++;continue}try{await new Promise((r,j)=>{const s=net.createServer();s.once('error',j);s.listen(p,()=>{s.close();r()})});console.log(p);break}catch{p++}}})()") && tmux new-session -d -s blog -n 'Blog Dev' "PORT=$PORT bun dev" && echo "Started on port $PORT - attaching to session blog" && tmux attach -t blog
